verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
More Love, more Power
More of You in my life
More Love, more Power
More of You in my life

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will worship You
with all of my heart
I will worship You
with all of my mind
I will worship You
with all of my strength
For You are my Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I will seek Your Face
with all of my heart
I will seek Your face
with all of my mind
I will seek Your face
with all of my Strength
For You are my Lord
